T02D2292:153a-1: tsa tur sh'i ti ba bo dh'a hri d'a ya n'a ma /
T02D2292:153a-3: grub thob brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i rtogs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba /
T02D2292:153a-4: ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2292:153a-5: yang dag don rtogs sangs rgyas dang 'dra grub pa'i zhabs la gus btud nas //
T02D2292:153a-6: gang zhig sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor mi dge las kyi chu srin gyis //
T02D2292:153b-0: rab tu g-yengs shing khrid gyur @153b de dag gdon phyir rnal 'byor dpa' bo yis //
T02D2292:153b-1: grub pa dag gi nyams myong rtogs pa'i lta ba phreng bar bsdeb par bya //
T02D2292:153b-2: gu ru l'u yi pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:153b-3: khyi rgod mi srun sna la sbrang rtsi bskus pas phyogs rnams kun du za bar byed //
T02D2292:153b-4: de bzhin blo dman skal min rnams la bla ma'i man ngag byin pas rang rgyud bsregs //
T02D2292:153b-5: skal ldan skye med rtogs pa rnams ni snang ba tug phrad tsam gyis rnam rtog 'joms //
T02D2292:153b-6: dper na glang chen rab brtan myos pa'i sna la ral gri btags pas dgra dpung 'joms //
T02D2292:153b-7: gu ru li la pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:153b-8: tshad med bzhi yi dgon pa ru //
T02D2292:153b-9: rnal 'byor rgyal po seng ge bzhin //
T02D2292:153b-10: mgo la g-yu mdog ral lngas brgyan //
T02D2292:153b-12: seng ge'i sder mo bcu dag gis //
T02D2292:153b-13: glang po la sogs sha rus 'byed //
T02D2292:153b-14: rnal 'byor pha rol phyin bcu yis //
T02D2292:153b-15: rnam rtog mi mthun phyogs rnams 'byed//
T02D2292:153b-16: li las de ltar rtogs nas grol //
T02D2292:153b-17: gu ru bi r'u pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:153b-18: phyag rgya chen po'i ngang nas lhan cig skyes pa de //
T02D2292:153b-19: mi bsam mi rigs bdag med rang gi ngang la
T02D2292:153b-20: gzhag / chad par mi 'gyur nyams su myong bar
T02D2292:153b-21: rang gis rig / rtag par mi 'gyur mngon zhen
T02D2292:153b-23: gu ru dombi ba'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:153b-24: gser 'gyur rtsi yi nus pa yis //
T02D2292:153b-25: lcags rnams gser du bsgyur ba ltar //
T02D2292:153b-26: rin chen dbang gi nus pa yis //
T02D2292:153b-27: nyon mongs gnyis med ye shes bsgyur //
T02D2292:153b-28: gu ru sha ba ri pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:153b-29: ma rig pa yi nags tshal du //
T02D2292:153b-30: gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi ri dags rgyu //
T02D2292:153b-31: thabs shes gnyis kyi gzhu bdungs nas //
T02D2292:153b-32: snying po'i don gyi mda' gcig 'phangs //
T02D2292:153b-34: sha ni gnyis su med par zos //
T02D2292:153b-35: ro ni bde ba chen por myong //
T02D2292:153b-36: 'bras bu phyag rgya chen po thob //
T02D2292:153b-37: gu ru sa ra ha'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:153b-38: kye ho grogs dag lhan cig skyes pa de //
T02D2292:153b-39: gzhan nas mi rnyed bla ma dam pa'i zhal nas rnyed //
T02D2292:153b-40: don dam zhal gyi ngo bo de rtogs na //
T02D2292:153b-41: yid la 'chi ba med cing lus la 'chad pa med //
T02D2292:153b-42: gu ru kam ka li'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:153b-43: ji ltar nam mkha' stong pa la //
T02D2292:153b-44: gcig dang gcig gnyis spangs pa'i gzugs //
T02D2292:154a-1: snang ye shes btsun mo de //
T02D2292:154a-2: dpe med tha snyad kun las 'das //
T02D2292:154a-3: gu ru min pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:154a-4: lcags kyu thogs pa'i nya pa ni /
T02D2292:154a-5: las dbang rgya mtsho'i nang du khyer //
T02D2292:154a-6: nya chen lus la rten bcas nas //
T02D2292:154a-7: lha chen gdams ngag nyams blangs pas //
T02D2292:154a-8: yon tan sa dang rdo dag gis //
T02D2292:154a-9: ma theg min pa zhes su grags //
T02D2292:154a-10: gu ru gho ra kha'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:154a-11: rigs ni rab dang 'bring dang tha ma ru //
T02D2292:154a-12: gnas pa'i rgyu la rkyen gyi stobs ldan pas //
T02D2292:154a-13: 'gag med las dbang 'bras bu ngo mtshar che //
T02D2292:154a-14: tso rang gi las byams sems bsnyen bkur byas //
T02D2292:154a-15: de rkyen stobs kyis khams kyi sa bon brtas //
T02D2292:154a-16: ma tsindhi yis 'chi med bdud rtsi brtan //
T02D2292:154a-17: gho ra kha yis gnyis med de nyid mthong //
T02D2292:154a-18: srid gsum ba dzi'i rgyal po ngo mtshar che //
T02D2292:154a-19: gu ru tso rang gi'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:154a-20: thog med srid pa yun ring du //
T02D2292:154a-21: ma rig sdong po'i rtsa ba la //
T02D2292:154a-22: 'du byed chu yis legs brlan nas //
T02D2292:154a-23: srid pa'i yan lag sna tshogs rgyas //
T02D2292:154a-24: ma rig pa yi shing chen de //
T02D2292:154a-25: bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag dang //
T02D2292:154a-26: shes rab gsum gyi ste'u yis //
T02D2292:154a-27: tso rang gi yis de nyid bcad //
T02D2292:154a-28: gu ru bhi na pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:154a-29: phyin ci log la goms pa'i sgra //
T02D2292:154a-30: gus dang brtson pas dpyad byas nas //
T02D2292:154a-31: ma grol skye med sgra dpyad pas //
T02D2292:154a-32: bhi na ba yis bdag med rtogs //
T02D2292:154a-33: gu ru sh'anti pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:154a-34: bu chung ma yis gsos pa yis //
T02D2292:154a-35: gyad kyi stobs dang ldan pa bzhin //
T02D2292:154a-36: blo chung bla ma'i man ngag gis //
T02D2292:154a-37: rim gyis brid pas theg pa che //
T02D2292:154a-38: rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa yi //
T02D2292:154a-39: nad rnams sman gyis sel ba ltar //
T02D2292:154a-40: nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa ni //
T02D2292:154a-41: bla ma'i gdams pas skad cig sreg / gu ru tanti ba'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:154a-42: 'jig rten pa yi thags mkhan rnams //
T02D2292:154a-43: snal ma thams cad thags su btags //
T02D2292:154a-44: nga yi bla ma'i man ngag gis//
T02D2292:154a-45: chos rnams thams cad thags su btags //
T02D2292:154a-46: ye shes lnga yi stong nyid ni //
T02D2292:154a-47: snal ma man ngag stag so dang //
T02D2292:154a-48: shes rab kyi ni sgrom bu yis //
T02D2292:154a-49: dbyings rig gnyis med chos skur btags //
T02D2292:154a-50: gu ru tsa ma ra pa'i zhal nas //
T02D2292:154a-51: rnam rtog mtshan ma'i ko ba 'di //
T02D2292:154b-0: stong nyid rdo rje'i @154b sbyangs nang du //
T02D2292:154b-1: chos brgyad spangs pa'i rgyun gyis ni //
T02D2292:154b-2: shes rab nyams myong bsnyung dang brtse mas //
T02D2292:154b-3: lhun grub chos sku'i lham byed pa //
T02D2292:154b-4: tsa ma ri pa lham mkhan mchog / gu ru khadga pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:154b-5: 'jig rten pa yi mtshon thogs dpa' bo ni //
T02D2292:154b-6: rgyun du dgra dang g-yul 'gyed kyang ;
T02D2292:154b-7: / bdag nyid sdug bsngal dbang du 'gyur //
T02D2292:154b-8: 'chi med ye shes ral gri yis //
T02D2292:154b-9: srid gsum dgra rnams pham byas nas //
T02D2292:154b-10: khadga pa ni longs spyod byed //
T02D2292:154b-11: gu ru n'a g'a rdzu na'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:154b-12: gang zhig ma rtogs spyod pa mi bya ste //
T02D2292:154b-13: byas na rgyal srid 'bangs kyis bzung ba bzhin //
T02D2292:154b-14: rtogs pas ma rtogs spyod pa mi bya ste //
T02D2292:154b-15: byas na glang chen 'dam du zin pa 'dra //
T02D2292:154b-16: gu ru kahna pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:154b-17: shing rta'i 'khor lo gcig dang mi ldan khrid kyang 'gro bar mi nus ltar //
T02D2292:154b-18: sbyin sogs 'bad pa byas kyang bla ma mi ldan dngos grub dam pa min //
T02D2292:154b-19: bya rgod rtsal rdzogs 'dab gshog rgyas pa dag ni
T02D2292:154b-20: nam mkha' gcod cing rgyug / skal bzang rnal 'byor
T02D2292:154b-21: rnams ni dbang gi gdams ngag khong du chud pas
T02D2292:154b-22: bde // gu ru ka na ri pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:154b-23: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad ngo bo gcig / de ni rtogs na rang bzhin rang gi sems //
T02D2292:154b-24: rtogs par 'dod na ma bcos ji bzhin zhog / goms par byas na rnal 'byor mngon du 'gyur //
T02D2292:154b-25: gu ru tha kha na'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:154b-26: gang zhig rna bar chu zhugs na //
T02D2292:154b-27: chu nyid kyis ni 'byin pa bzhin //
T02D2292:154b-28: de bzhin snang srid brdzun pa la //
T02D2292:154b-29: brdzun par bsgoms pas bden pa mthong //
T02D2292:154b-30: gu ru na ro pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:154b-31: 'khor los sgyur rgyal dpung tshogs rnams kyis ni //
T02D2292:154b-32: gling dang gling phran rnams la dbang byed ltar //
T02D2292:154b-33: lhan cig skyes pa'i ro 'gyur rnal 'byor ni //
T02D2292:154b-34: 'khor ba dbang sgyur bde ba chen po yin //
T02D2292:154b-35: gu ru sha wa ri pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:154b-36: legs byas ri mo mkhan dag gis //
T02D2292:154b-37: shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs brnyan bris //
T02D2292:154b-39: brtags na ma grub gzugs brnyan snang //
T02D2292:154b-40: gu ru te lo pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:154b-41: ri rab ngos la bya gnas pa //
T02D2292:154b-42: bya yi rang bzhin gser du snang //
T02D2292:154b-43: mkhas pa skye med rtogs pa yis //
T02D2292:155a-2: gu ru tsa tra pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:155a-3: rnal 'byor pa yis gang snang gdams pa yin //
T02D2292:155a-4: mthong ba skye med rtogs pa slob dpon mchog / byis pa rnams kyi gnyis 'dzin rtog pa yin //
T02D2292:155a-5: dge dang sdig pa'i 'bras bu de la gnyis su 'byung //
T02D2292:155a-6: gu ru bha tra pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:155a-7: stong nyid don rtogs 'khrul pa zhi //
T02D2292:155a-8: byams pa bsgoms pas spyod pa rdzogs //
T02D2292:155a-9: sna tshogs gnyis med goms pa yis //
T02D2292:155a-10: mi mthun ro gcig 'bras bur rtogs //
T02D2292:155a-11: gu ru dhu kha na dha'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:155a-12: kun rdzob bskyed pa'i rim pa dang //
T02D2292:155a-13: don dam rdzogs pa'i rim pa gnyis //
T02D2292:155a-14: zung 'jug phyag rgya chen por bsgoms //
T02D2292:155a-16: gu ru aa dzo ka'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:155a-17: bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag gis //
T02D2292:155a-18: steng sgo sna rtse thig ler bsgoms //
T02D2292:155a-19: de nyid la ni blo brtan pas //
T02D2292:155a-20: yungs kar stong nyid dmigs pa stor //
T02D2292:155a-21: gu ru ka la pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:155a-22: 'gro ba 'di dag thog med dus nas 'khrul //
T02D2292:155a-23: de yis 'jig rten thams cad ma snyoms grags //
T02D2292:155a-24: bla ma'i gdams ngag bdud rtsi'i sman gyis ni //
T02D2292:155a-25: 'khrul pa'i nad rnams skad cig gcig la sreg / gu ru dombi pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:155a-26: yun ring dus nas dri ma 'khrud byas kyang //
T02D2292:155a-27: sol ba'i rang bzhin dkar por 'gyur ba med //
T02D2292:155a-28: rang bzhin rnam dag stong nyid dag par 'gyur //
T02D2292:155a-29: bla ma'i gdams pa rang bzhin khrus mkhan mchog / gu ru kam ka na'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:155a-30: rtog pa yid bzhin nor bu la //
T02D2292:155a-31: nyams su myong ba'i mdog byung bas //
T02D2292:155a-33: ro snyoms ldan pa rnams kyis 'grub //
T02D2292:155a-34: gu ru ka ma la'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:155a-35: rgya mtsho zab cing rgya che'i nang na nor bus gang ba la //
T02D2292:155a-36: klu yi rgyal po rnams ni de la longs spyod ngo mtshar che //
T02D2292:155a-37: de bzhin snang grags thams cad ye nas chos sku yin pa la //
T02D2292:155a-38: rtogs pa dang ldan longs spyod ngo mtshar che //
T02D2292:155a-39: gu ru dhim gi pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:155a-40: rta dang glang po rgya mtsho 'dren rab tu bde //
T02D2292:155a-41: spre'u byis pa chu yi ri mo 'dra na rtog pa yin //
T02D2292:155a-42: chu bo nyi ma sman dang 'dra na dbyer mi phyed //
T02D2292:155b-0: gtsug phud mig dang 'khor lo lta @155b bus 'bras bu thob //
T02D2292:155b-2: mngon zhen med pa byams pa'i mchog / gnas lugs rtogs pa snying rje yin //
T02D2292:155b-3: zag med bde ba dga' ba ste //
T02D2292:155b-4: chos rnams ro gcig btang snyoms rdzogs //
T02D2292:155b-5: gu ru danta na'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:155b-6: ji ltar dran rig sna tshogs dang //
T02D2292:155b-7: rtog med dbyings su zad cing 'gag / de bzhin snang srid chos rnams kun //
T02D2292:155b-8: stong nyid dbyings su zad cing 'gag / gu ru ku ku ri pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:155b-9: sangs rgyas mchod sogs rnams la don mi 'byung //
T02D2292:155b-10: 'dod dang 'bad rtsol yod na sangs rgyas min //
T02D2292:155b-11: bla ma dam pa'i byin rlabs nyams myong dpal //
T02D2292:155b-12: cha ldan rang la yod kyang ma mthong ngo //
T02D2292:155b-13: gu ru ku tsi pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:155b-14: gang la lhan cig skyes pa ni //
T02D2292:155b-15: glang po che yi mig bzhin du //
T02D2292:155b-16: bze re bskyed na zug rdu 'byung //
T02D2292:155b-17: glod na ma zhen bsam gtan mchog / bla ma'i gsung gi 'od zer gyis //
T02D2292:155b-18: yod dang med pa'i mtha' ma rnyed //
T02D2292:155b-19: gang zhig ma rnyed de mthong ngo //
T02D2292:155b-20: mtha' de rtogs na dong yis mchog / gu ru dha mu'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:155b-21: gnyis las ma rig dug dag gis //
T02D2292:155b-22: rig pa skyes pa rgyun du zin //
T02D2292:155b-23: bla ma'i gsung gi 'od zer gyis //
T02D2292:155b-24: snang srid 'khrul pa'i dug nad sel //
T02D2292:155b-25: gu ru ma hi la'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:155b-26: ma rig pa yi nga rgyal gyis //
T02D2292:155b-27: ma rtog yid bzhin nor bu bsgribs //
T02D2292:155b-29: ro snyoms ldan pa rnams kyis 'grub //
T02D2292:155b-30: gu ru aa tsindha'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:155b-31: dmigs med phyag rgya chen po ru //
T02D2292:155b-32: 'khrul pa'i dran yid sna tshogs stor //
T02D2292:155b-33: ye shes rig pa'i snang ba yis //
T02D2292:155b-34: gang snang phyag rgya chen por mthong //
T02D2292:155b-35: gu ru pa ha'i zhal nas //
T02D2292:155b-37: zhen pa med pas dngos med bde //
T02D2292:155b-38: brtag pa thams cad der shes bde //
T02D2292:155b-39: bsgrub pa med pa'i gsang ba bde //
T02D2292:155b-40: gu ru ni la na'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:155b-42: sa bon g-yo ba dga' ba ste //
T02D2292:155b-43: snying po 'byin pa mchog tu dga' //
T02D2292:155b-44: lhan skyes dga' bral bla med thob //
T02D2292:155b-45: gu ru bhu su ku'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:155b-46: bdag nyid ma rtogs bar du ro la khyad par che //
T02D2292:156a-2: rtogs pa'i dus na 'khor 'das bde ba chen po ste //
T02D2292:156a-3: dper na rgya mtsho'i nang na 'bar ba'i rin chen bzhin //
T02D2292:156a-4: gu ru aindra bh'u ti'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:156a-5: dus kyi sna rtse dag ni byin rlabs dag dang mi ldan na //
T02D2292:156a-6: phyi dang nang du spyod pa dag gi rnal 'byor 'tshang mi rgya //
T02D2292:156a-7: dga' bde'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas dag dang khyad par med pa ni //
T02D2292:156a-8: zhen pa btang na rang bzhin skyes pa'i nyams myong mchog tu dga' //
T02D2292:156a-9: gu ru me ko pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:156a-10: bla ma dam pa dag las dang por rang gi sems rtogs bya //
T02D2292:156a-11: de nas snang ba kun du tha dad med bya ste //
T02D2292:156a-12: gnyis med goms pas dur khrod gnas su 'dug par bya //
T02D2292:156a-13: mnyam par rtogs nas smyon pa'i brtul zhugs spyod par bya //
T02D2292:156a-14: gu ru ko ta la'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:156a-15: bde dang sdug bsngal thams cad sems las byung //
T02D2292:156a-16: bla ma'i gdams pas sems kyi ri bo brkos //
T02D2292:156a-17: blo ldan sa yi ri bo brkos gyur kyang //
T02D2292:156a-18: gnyug ma'i bde ba chen po thob mi 'gyur //
T02D2292:156a-19: tha mal shes pa snying gi dbus su sad //
T02D2292:156a-20: tshogs drug dag na bde ba rgyun mi chad //
T02D2292:156a-21: btags pa thams cad don med sdug bsngal rgyu //
T02D2292:156a-22: bsgom dang bsgom med gnyug ma'i ngang la shog / gu ru kam ri pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:156a-23: rang bzhin gzugs kyi sol mal du //
T02D2292:156a-24: dran rig rnam rtog sna tshogs kun //
T02D2292:156a-25: la lar sa'i sbud pa bus //
T02D2292:156a-26: dh'u t'i ye shes me sbar nas //
T02D2292:156a-27: dug gsum rnam rtog chos skur brdungs //
T02D2292:156a-28: kam ri ba yis rtogs nas grol //
T02D2292:156a-29: gu ru dz'a landha ra'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:156a-30: khams gsum lus ngag yid gsum gyi //
T02D2292:156a-31: dran rig rnam rtog sna tshogs kun //
T02D2292:156a-32: la la ra sadh'u t'i ru //
T02D2292:156a-33: byin brlabs ci phyir bcings mi bgyi //
T02D2292:156a-34: gu ru r'a hu la'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:156a-35: phyi yi sgra gcan bzang po yis //
T02D2292:156a-36: zla ba'i snang ba gnyis med zos //
T02D2292:156a-37: kun rdzob zla ba'i thig le ni //
T02D2292:156a-38: dbyings rig sgra gcan gnyis med zos //
T02D2292:156a-39: gu ru dharma pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:156a-40: snang srid chos kyi snod du ni //
T02D2292:156a-41: byang chub sems kyi mar khu blugs //
T02D2292:156a-42: tshogs drug rnam shes sdong bu la //
T02D2292:156a-43: gnyis med ye shes me sbar bas //
T02D2292:156b-0: rnam rtog 'khrul pa'i mun pa @156b bcom //
T02D2292:156b-1: gu ru dho ka ri'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:156b-2: chos dbyings rang bzhin snod nang du //
T02D2292:156b-3: rig pa chos sku'i rdzas nyid bcug / dbyings rig gnyis kyi 'bras bu ni //
T02D2292:156b-4: skal ldan rnal 'byor rig pas rtogs //
T02D2292:156b-5: gu ru me dhi na'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:156b-6: rig pa gnyug ma'i shes rab dang //
T02D2292:156b-7: nyon mongs gos pa'i thabs dag gis //
T02D2292:156b-8: rang bzhin gnas lugs gzhi dag las //
T02D2292:156b-9: bde chen lhun grub 'bras bu rtogs //
T02D2292:156b-10: gu ru ba ka dza'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:156b-11: ji ltar bla mas ma zin ma rtogs dus dag tu //
T02D2292:156b-12: yid bzhin nor bu dang ni nor bu mching bu mnyam //
T02D2292:156b-13: bla ma dang ni rtog pas yongs su zin gyur na //
T02D2292:156b-14: nyi zla'i 'od dang srin bu me khyer ji bzhin no //
T02D2292:156b-15: gu ru ghanta pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:156b-16: la lar sa dh'u t'i gsum //
T02D2292:156b-17: bla mas byin brlabs bcing bar byas //
T02D2292:156b-18: bdag dang sems dang snang ba gsum //
T02D2292:156b-19: rtog pa bskyed phyir mkhas pas brtan //
T02D2292:156b-20: gu ru dzo gi pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:156b-21: mar me'i rtse mo lta bu yi //
T02D2292:156b-22: phra zhing gsal ba'i yid goms pas //
T02D2292:156b-23: brtan zhing g-yo ba'i dngos po kun //
T02D2292:156b-24: chos kyi dbyings su thim par 'gyur //
T02D2292:156b-25: gu ru'i tsa lu ka'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:156b-26: bla ma dam pa'i gdams pa ni //
T02D2292:156b-27: yun ring dus na goms pa yis//
T02D2292:156b-28: sa sogs rig pas thim pa las //
T02D2292:156b-29: rang snang phyag rgya chen por 'gyur //
T02D2292:156b-30: gu ru go tu ri'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:156b-31: phyi nang chos kun sems su 'dus //
T02D2292:156b-32: sems nyid gsal ba'i don rtogs na //
T02D2292:156b-33: spyod lam rnam bzhi chos kyi sku //
T02D2292:156b-34: rtog pa mngon gyur rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D2292:156b-35: gu ru lu tsi ka'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:156b-36: gang zhig thog ma med dus nas //
T02D2292:156b-38: gru mchog bla ma dam pa yis //
T02D2292:156b-39: brgal dka'i mtsho las de ring rgal //
T02D2292:156b-40: gu ru na ra gu na'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:156b-41: chu rlabs lta bu'i nyams bstan nas //
T02D2292:156b-42: spyod pa thabs kyis gzhol bar bya //
T02D2292:156b-43: bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag gis //
T02D2292:156b-44: chags sdang rtog pa rang bzhin byas //
T02D2292:156b-45: gu ru drag a'a na nda'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:156b-46: ye shes rig pa'i ting 'dzin ni //
T02D2292:156b-47: thog ma med de gnyug mar gnas //
T02D2292:156b-48: ji ltar rtogs na nges pa yin //
T02D2292:156b-49: rnam rtog dran pa de nyid mun //
T02D2292:157a-2: gar yang ma lta dbus su ltos //
T02D2292:157a-3: mchog dang dga' bral bde ba che //
T02D2292:157a-4: sngags kyi gsang ba stobs brjod nas //
T02D2292:157a-5: rnal 'byor rtags ni dgu bar bya //
T02D2292:157a-6: gu ru tsamba ka'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:157a-7: thabs dang shes rab 'od gsal lta bu la //
T02D2292:157a-8: bla ma chu po'i rgyun gyis kun la khyab //
T02D2292:157a-9: lhan cig skyes pa dpag bsam shing dag las //
T02D2292:157a-10: 'bras bu sku gsum rang gsal rab tu rdzogs //
T02D2292:157a-11: gu ru bhiksha na'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:157a-12: bla med dur khrod byang chub gnas chen du //
T02D2292:157a-13: zung 'jug bde chen bgrod dka'i lam bstan pas//
T02D2292:157a-14: phyag mtshan bral ba'i dbang phyug rnal 'byor mchog / bla ma'i gdams pa'i drin gyis de nyid rtogs //
T02D2292:157a-15: gu ru dhe li pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:157a-16: bdag nyid gdod nas sangs rgyas la //
T02D2292:157a-17: rtogs pa'i dbang gis chos nyid yin //
T02D2292:157a-18: dbang blangs lhan cig skyes pa des //
T02D2292:157a-20: gu ru kam pa la'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:157a-21: rgyu mthun las kyi 'khor lo yis //
T02D2292:157a-22: srid pa'i glu gar sna tshogs byas //
T02D2292:157a-23: ye shes rig pa'i me yis ni //
T02D2292:157a-24: 'khrul pa'i dri ma ma lus bsregs //
T02D2292:157a-25: gu ru dh'u ma pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:157a-26: sngags pa kun gyi sdom pa mchog / rang gi rtogs la zhen med de //
T02D2292:157a-27: gnyug ma sems kyi rtog pas gang //
T02D2292:157a-28: sangs rgyas thams cad de mthong yin //
T02D2292:157a-29: gu ru ma ni bha dra'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:157a-30: gang zhig mi rtog dus kyi tshe //
T02D2292:157a-31: rnam rtog sna tshogs sgra phyir 'breng //
T02D2292:157a-32: de phyir rang bzhin mngon du gyur //
T02D2292:157a-33: gang snang rang bzhin de de nyid //
T02D2292:157a-34: gu ru me kha la'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:157a-35: phyi dang nang kun sems su 'dus //
T02D2292:157a-36: zhen pa med na ro snyoms ldan //
T02D2292:157a-37: 'bad rtsol med na bsgom pa'i mchog / gnyis med bde chen rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D2292:157a-38: gu ru n'a ga ka la ka'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:157a-39: go cha chen po bgos nas kyang //
T02D2292:157a-40: nor bu lta bu'i snying stobs kyis ;
T02D2292:157a-41: / rang gi sems kyi gru btang nas //
T02D2292:157a-42: ri mo'i khong par nges par zhugs //
T02D2292:157a-43: gu ru ka la ka la'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:157a-44: chos dbyings rnam dag mkha' dkyil du //
T02D2292:157a-45: skye med 'brug sgra legs bsgrags pas //
T02D2292:157a-46: snang srid 'khrul pa'i chos rnams kun //
T02D2292:157b-0: sku gsum ye shes 'bras bu @157b mdzes //
T02D2292:157b-1: gu ru kan ta la'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:157b-2: bla ma dam pa'i kha ba dag dang //
T02D2292:157b-3: snying rje yi ni skud pa yis //
T02D2292:157b-4: khams gsum ma lus gos su btsems //
T02D2292:157b-5: gos kyi rnal 'byor ngo mtshar che //
T02D2292:157b-6: gu ru dha hu la'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:157b-7: zung 'jug rig pa rin chen mdzod //
T02D2292:157b-8: gnyis med ngang ste btsal bas min //
T02D2292:157b-9: bya ba btang ba'i sems bzhin du //
T02D2292:157b-10: ji ltar gzhag pa de ltar bde //
T02D2292:157b-11: gu ru au dhi la'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:157b-13: ma 'brel bag chags ma btang zung //
T02D2292:157b-14: gang la mi gnas 'gro ba zung //
T02D2292:157b-15: gzhan la btsal ba de yang min //
T02D2292:157b-16: gu ru ka p'a la'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:157b-17: dngos kun gnyis med rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D2292:157b-18: rgyan sogs thod pa glo bur ba //
T02D2292:157b-20: rang gis btsal bas rnyed ma yin //
T02D2292:157b-21: gu ru ki ra ba la'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:157b-22: ji ltar ma rtogs phar du rang gzhan rtog pas bcings //
T02D2292:157b-23: de tshe rtogs par gyur na rang gzhan gnyis ma grub /
T02D2292:157b-24: des na sangs rgyas zhes bya rang gi bla dags yin //
T02D2292:157b-25: de nyid spros bral ma bcos rang sar rang bzhin zung //
T02D2292:157b-26: gu ru pa ga ra'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:157b-27: 'gro rnams sdug bsngal gyis gdungs la //
T02D2292:157b-28: 'dod yon dag gi char phab bo //
T02D2292:157b-29: de bzhin nyid kyi gnas chen du //
T02D2292:157b-30: rig pa'i klu rgyal nyid gzir nas //
T02D2292:157b-31: skal ldan rig 'dzin pho mo la //
T02D2292:157b-32: gsang sngags rig pa'i char bab po //
T02D2292:157b-33: gu ru sarba bhaksha'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:157b-34: gang zhig ma rtogs dus na sna tshogs ro la khyad par che //
T02D2292:157b-35: gang zhig rtogs pa'i dus su ro rnams ngo bo bye brag med //
T02D2292:157b-36: de bzhin ma rtogs nyid na 'khor 'das tha dad snang //
T02D2292:157b-37: de nyid rtogs na 'khor ba myang 'das bde ba che //
T02D2292:157b-38: gu ru n'a ga bo dhi'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:157b-39: sa la gnas na thams cad skal ba bzang //
T02D2292:157b-40: rgya mtsho'i gting du phyin na dbul dang bral //
T02D2292:157b-41: ral gri lag tu thogs na longs spyod che //
T02D2292:157b-42: phyogs med dag tu phyin na gnyen dang phrad //
T02D2292:157b-43: gu ru d'a ri ka pa'i zha la nas /
T02D2292:157b-44: bde ba chen po rang la yod kyang ma rtogs 'khrul pas bsgribs //
T02D2292:157b-45: bde gsal 'dod pa'i bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags bya //
T02D2292:157b-46: tshogs gnyis ma bsags skye ba brgya ru 'bad byas kyang //
T02D2292:158a-0: bla ma dag dang mi ldan bde ba chen po rtogs mi @158a * //
T02D2292:158a-2: gu ru su ta ba'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:158a-3: thams cad bde gshegs rang bzhin te //
T02D2292:158a-4: blos gzhag log pa'i lam spangs nas //
T02D2292:158a-5: snying po'i lam la brtson byas na //
T02D2292:158a-6: snying po'i 'bras bu gdon mi za //
T02D2292:158a-7: gang gis bla ma dam pa las //
T02D2292:158a-8: dbang rnams lhan cig skyes pa des //
T02D2292:158a-9: ro yis kun la khyab bya ste //
T02D2292:158a-11: gu ru pa na ha'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:158a-12: snying po gnyug ma'i don bsam pas //
T02D2292:158a-13: ji ltar bsam pa de ltar rtogs //
T02D2292:158a-14: des na de nyid rang dgar gnas //
T02D2292:158a-16: gu ru ko ki la'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:158a-17: bya ba btang ba man ngag yin //
T02D2292:158a-18: zhen 'dod med pa rtogs pa yin //
T02D2292:158a-19: bde ba dngos med sgom pa yin //
T02D2292:158a-20: bsgrub bya med na 'bras bu'i mchog / gu ru aa nam ga'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:158a-21: 'khor ba snying po med pa yin //
T02D2292:158a-23: ma rig mngon zhen dregs pa yis //
T02D2292:158a-24: dug gis bzung na bde bar 'dzin //
T02D2292:158a-25: mngon zhen dug nad sbyangs pa na //
T02D2292:158a-26: 'khor ba nyid kyang chos kyi sku //
T02D2292:158a-27: gu ru n'i laksha na'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:158a-28: dang por blo ldan rtogs pa skyed //
T02D2292:158a-29: gnyis pa gnas lugs ma yengs sgom //
T02D2292:158a-30: de nas nyams myong skyes pa na //
T02D2292:158a-31: spyod pa bags kyis spyad par bya //
T02D2292:158a-32: gu ru sa mu dra'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:158a-33: skye med rtogs kyang nyams myong dang bral na //
T02D2292:158a-34: dper na srin mo lag tu bu khyer 'dra //
T02D2292:158a-35: nyams myong gnas lugs dag dang ma 'bral na /
T02D2292:158a-36: de yang glang chen 'dam du zhugs pa 'dra //
T02D2292:158a-37: gu ru bi ra li pa'i zhal nas /
T02D2292:158a-38: bla ma dam pa mthong na de nyid mthong //
T02D2292:158a-39: nam mkha'i mthongs su bsgoms na dben pa'i mchog /
T02D2292:158a-40: chos rnams yongs su rtogs na mi mthun med //
T02D2292:158a-42: skal ldan dag gi don phyir bla ma rnams kyi rtogs pa'i snying po kun //
T02D2292:158a-43: tshad med blo yis legs bsdus bsod nams rgya chen bdag gis gang gis gang thob des //
T02D2292:158a-44: 'gro rnams bla ma dang phrad byin rlabs yang dag sems la zhugs gyur nas //
T02D2292:158a-45: gnas lugs don nyid yang dag sems rtogs rgyal ba'i
T02D2292:158a-46: sa la gnas gyur cig / grub thob brgyad cu
T02D2292:158b-0: rtsa bzhi'i rtogs pa'i snying @158b po slob dpon dpa'
